channel.title: Dancemonkey on ReactOS Website
channel.description: Recent content in Dancemonkey on ReactOS Website

item.title: Newsletter 13
item.description: I'm the new guy(s) Yup, that's right, we're the new newsletter writers (those two words should never be used in combination - I promise never to do it again). We fought off a crowd of people breaking their necks to apply, and finally, we're here. So. Who are we? I am Dana Burkart, I will do most of the writing, and my associate - Samuel Serapion - will be providing most of the information.
